Updated November     pm





Jeff Hall said he is currently looking for interns at Chapter
One the modern local a gastropub in Santa Ana PERIOD

Former Orange Coast College student Jeff Hall created a new
Orange County hot spot for the modern local. hall said OCC gave him an incredible culinary foundation that
prepared him to open  restaurants and own two PERIOD

I saw the potential and intrinsic value in Santa Ana which is
unlike anywhere else in Orange County Hall said PERIOD

According to him the location influenced the concept of Chapter
One the modern local PERIOD

We embrace the history and culture of the building and are doing
something to really celebrate it he said PERIOD

Hall also a founder and original owner of Haven Gastropub in
Orange opened Chapter One on St PERIOD Patricks Day this year PERIOD

At the heart of Haven it is a pub PERIOD With the local it takes it
even further PERIOD We have a great kitchen and culinary cocktails he
said PERIOD

According to Hall no one else uses a culinary style in their
cocktails like that of Chapter One PERIOD

Hall said that since his first jobs working in kitchens he loved
creating PERIOD

What I like more than anything is to be a part of the kitchen he
said PERIOD Chef Barber at OCC taught me the basics PERIOD I learned to cook
for an audience. since attending Coast Hall has developed a following with Chapter
One and according to him more than  of their unique Moscow
Mules have been sold to date PERIOD He said that most of Chapter Ones
notoriety comes from the cocktail which is carbonated to
order PERIOD

We freshly press ginger root to make a house ginger beer for the
Moscow Mule Jeff Jensen Halls business partner said PERIOD

Hall said he is especially proud of the bar program and that the
bar is treated as a kitchen as well PERIOD

The bar program is where I put most of my heart into he
said PERIOD

According to Hall in addition to the strength of the bar the
kitchen is where creativity also thrives PERIOD Unlike the bar which
consists of beverages from every part of the world he said the
kitchens ingredients come locally and within  miles from the
storefront PERIOD

We find whatever is fresh seasonal and local and put creativity
into it he said PERIOD

Hall said a constant goal for Chapter One is to be more refined and
to push for more creativity and to be on the cutting edge of what
is next PERIOD

Im just following what I love and what I am passionate about
which is good food good company good times Hall said PERIOD We love
what we do here. log In
